name: Chickenhero
description:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.rora.chickenhero&hl=en_US

In Chicken Hero you’re training your chicken, fostering it and fighting against monsters. There are numerous ways in which your chicken can evolve and thanks to the roguelite mechanics you can always let your chicken take another path without having to start over. Your goal is to raise the strongest possible monster and prove to everyone that with the help of persistent training a chicken can become way stronger  than any monster.
